page.title: 10An Interesting Family.
page.content: Mr. Chorlton is a builder and his wife is a dental assistant.They live in a 1936 detached house with their two sons,Michael(22) and Ian(20). Ian serves with the Royal Military Police and Parachute Regiment.He is a keen athlete who played rugby at school and runs for the army. Michael trains every day and{hopes {to run in the 5000m at the 1988 {Olympics}.Although he has never run a Marathon he has trophies for 1500m, 10000m and holds the Yorkshire 10mile record{(47mins47secs)}.He had a notable victory over World class athlete Steve Cram in the Newcastle Road Race in 1984.Mr. Chorlton prefers to coach his son,who runs with full family support.
